rules_text:
Kicker {V}{V}{W} [i](You may pay an additional {V}{V}{W} as you cast this spell. Spend a different nonwhite color of mana on each {V}.)[/i]
Enchant creature
When this Aura enters, draw a card. If it was kicked, create a 4/4 colorless Elemental creature token. You may attach this Aura to that token.
Enchanted creature has flying.
